What would you do with 25 trillion dollars? Here is what I would do with that.

With 25 trillion dollars, I would do this:

1. Start a space tourism company.

2. Fund Mars-One

3. Start an asteroid mining company OR invest in Planetary Resources.

4. Build a Moon colony.

5. Drop food aid into poor countries.

6. Build massive solar arrays around the sun and beam back the energy.

7. Try to pay off America\'s debt.

8. Help the Earth in any way possible.

9. Fund any research into anything that will benifit Humanity.

10. Fund SETI.

11. Fund Indie game companies. (Ex. Squad.)

12. Start my own game company.

13. Start my own nation.

14. Start Mars colonies.

15. Earth defence system.

16. Asteroid colony ships.

17. Fund UN.

18. Try to unite the world as one.

19. Donate to charity.

20. Commercial space stations.

21. Build factories on the Moon.

22. Try to stop pollution.

23. Try to bribe congressmen so that I have control over the USA. (Ex. Change our economic policies, change our diplomatic view, ect.)

24. Build a massive orbital shipyard.

25. Build a massive floating airport.

26. Buy a suit that can take bullets. (NO ASSINATIONS!!!!)

27. A powerful and nice computer.

(Credit to those who put some of these ideas up.)
